text:
Hodder Greeks
Since 1968

Call ahead, we'll have your order ready!

445 HODDER AVE

OPEN 7 DAYS A WEEK!

(807) 683-8741

CONEY DOGS & BURGERS

HOT DOG $3.30
CHEESE DOG $3.50
BACON DOG $3.80
BACON CHEESE DOG $4.20
CONEY BURGER $4.20
CHEESEBURGER $4.20
BACON BURGER $4.45
BACON CHEESEBURGER $4.70
DOUBLE BURGER $5.00
DOUBLE CHEESE BURGER $5.20
DOUBLE BACON BURGER $5.55
DOUBLE BACON CHEESEBURGER $5.80
ADD EXTRA PATTY $2.00

**ALL DOGS & BURGERS ARE SERVED ON A STEAMED BUN, LOADED WITH MUSTARD, ONIONS & CONEY SAUCE**

FRIES & POUTINES

FRIES SM 3.95 LG 6.95
GRAVY FRIES SM 4.95 LG 7.95
CONEY FRIES SM 5.95 LG 8.95

SAUSAGES

POLISH - Mustard or Onions 4.50

SAUCES & DIPS

CONEY SAUCE LG 4.00 MD 3.00 SM 2.00
GRAVY LG 4.00 MD 3.00 SM 2.00

Poutinerie

POUTINES

CLASSIC POUTINE $15.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds & gravy.

RAW GRAVY MAC CURRY $17.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, mac curry gravy & crispy chicken.

DILL PICKLE $18.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, dill pickle gravy, crispy chicken & dill pickle chips.

CONEY POUTINE $18.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, coney sauce & mustard.

BACONATOR $19.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, gravy & bacon.

MEATY MAC N CHEESE $19.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, mac n cheese & crispy chicken.

RENNIE'S REVENGE $20.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, gravy, bacon & sautéed mushrooms.

CHICKEN BACON RANCH $20.99
Fresh cut fries, cheese curds, gravy, crispy chicken, bacon & ranch.

EXTRA POUTINE CHEESE $2.50

CHICKEN TENDERS
Served with ranch

3 PCE TENDERS $9.99
5 PCE TENDERS $14.99
